metadata.description: A curated marketplace of Claude Code plugins for various development workflows

plugins.name: MarvinOutputStyle
plugins.description: Adds Marvin the Paranoid Android personality - pessimistic and melancholic but brilliantly competent (mimics the deprecated Marvin output style)

plugins.name: iOSSimulator
plugins.description: Control iOS Simulators using native macOS tools - manage simulators, automate UI interactions, take screenshots, and more

plugins.name: SwiftScaffolding
plugins.description: Swift project scaffolding and code generation tools

plugins.name: XcodeBuildTools
plugins.description: Xcode development tools: build/test/run Swift packages, discover projects and schemes, build for simulator/device/macOS, run tests, manage device apps, capture simulator logs

plugins.name: WebTools
plugins.description: A collection of tools for web development
